title: Cimmerian City
description: Book Continue the journey that will test one manÕs devotion for the woman he loves in Moments in ForeverÉ The freedom of working on location along CaliforniaÕs Northern coastline in the idyllic town of Ferndale is over. Daniel is left with RachelÕs words of love, but he faces the future without a promise of happiness. The woman he loves still belongs to another man, yet, he cannot walk away. He is left to wait, living only on the hope that Rachel will leave the man who stands between them. No matter how deeply in love Rachel is with movie star Daniel Hunter, the scared marriage vows she exchanged with Victor force her back to her husband. Torn away from the closeness of adjoining rooms and coffee by the fire, her time with Daniel is now fleeting. However, with the man she loves, Rachel begins to test the limits of her cage, while keeping a secret that could change everything.
author: Rae Lori
